Subject: Re: East and West
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron lands gracefully on the surface of the island, and looks around.
Where could the signatures have gone? he wondered to himself. He was upset
about his master and didnt have the patience to play any games, "Show
yourselves" he yelled, as he aimed his right arm into the air, and pulled
the trigger to accent his mood. His cannon started a miniature chemical
reaction, with small light eminating from it, the a burst of raw powerful
nuclear energy burst from it, scroching the sky with its power.
